ai-patthana21.26:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.26:1.1_0: You don’t realize the cause or condition for the reason for the sake of having a trainee.
ai-patthana21.26:2.1_0: You don’t understand the cause or condition for the sake of a trainee,
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_0: Not by practicing only for the sake of investigating, nor by for the sake of fun.
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_1: It won’t give rise to the ending of attachments.
